languages.name: Chief Miner
firstDialogue: What brings you on our humble island? Interested in trading something against typhoon rock?
*He listens to you, and his welcoming tone fades away.
Oh. Up north you say? You must talk about these fools, perched on their peak.
Good luck then. I’ve never come across people so stubborn and short minded.
They are out of reality, if you ask me.
Anyway… There's a strange rock to the east. You might want to begin there.
Also, it happens we got our hands on this thingy.
I can give it to you…
...if you have something to trade of course.
*He looks at you from head to toe, searching for something of value
I guess I’ll be satisfied with anything really.
secondDialogue: As I said, you might want to go to that rock to the east.
